name: @fastybird/smart-panel
description: Repository for FastyBird Smart Panel packages development

scripts.pretty: pnpm run -r pretty:write && pnpm run -r pretty:check
scripts.generate:openapi: pnpm --filter @fastybird/smart-panel-backend run generate:openapi && pnpm --filter @fastybird/smart-panel-admin run generate:openapi
scripts.bootstrap: pnpm install && pnpm run generate:spec && pnpm --filter @fastybird/smart-panel-extension-sdk build && pnpm --filter @fastybird/smart-panel-extension-example build && pnpm run generate:openapi && pnpm --filter @fastybird/smart-panel-backend run typeorm:migration:run && pnpm --filter @fastybird/smart-panel-backend run build && pnpm --filter @fastybird/smart-panel-admin run build
scripts.admin:postinstall: node -e "process.exit(process.env.FB_NO_ADMIN_BUILD ? 0 : 1)" || pnpm run admin:extensions && pnpm run admin:build
